thread.title: Kirk Parrish Joins Cartus as Director of Business Development in the U.S. Southern Region - Yahoo Finance
thread.title_full: Kirk Parrish Joins Cartus as Director of Business Development in the U.S. Southern Region - Yahoo Finance

author: Cartus
title: Kirk Parrish Joins Cartus as Director of Business Development in the U.S. Southern Region - Yahoo Finance
text:
DANBURY, Conn., Sept. 24, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Kirk Parrish, an executive with more than 15 years' experience in both international and domestic relocation and household goods sales, has joined Cartus Corporation as director of business development for the company's U.S. Southern Region with responsibility for Texas, Colorado, and New Mexico. Cartus is a leading provider of global relocation services.
View photo
. Most recently, Parrish served as director, corporate business for The Paxton Companies, where he was responsible for discovering, cultivating, and growing new corporate business. He was previously a business development director for Ward North American, where he was a seven-time recipient of North American Van Lines' Gold Sales Award for exceeding performance targets. He has also been an account manager in the relocation industry, where he gained experience in developing successful business relationships with leading multinational companies and with managing high-level client relationships.
"Kirk is an experienced sales executive with a proven track record of success, and we look forward to his contributions to our national accounts in the Southern region," said Kathi Feczko, Cartus senior vice president, Global Business Development.
A resident of Richardson, Texas, Parrish served in the United States Marine Corps from 1990 to 1995 and is the recipient of a Navy Commendation Medal. He will be based in Cartus' office in Irving, Texas.

About Cartus
Cartus provides trusted guidance to organizations of all types and sizes that require global relocation solutions. This year marks the 60 th anniversary for Cartus, which serves more than half of the Fortune 50 and offers its services in 185 countries, providing companies around the world with the full spectrum of relocation services, including language and intercultural training. Cartus is part of Realogy Holdings Corp. ( RLGY ), a global leader in real estate franchising and provider of real estate brokerage, relocation and settlement services. To find out how our greater experience, reach, and hands-on guidance can help your company, visit www.cartus.com click www.realogy.com for more information.
